import{createStore,applyMiddleware}from"redux";import{thunk}from'redux-thunk';import rootReducer from"./Redux/reducers";// Asegúrate de que la ruta sea correcta
import{composeWithDevTools}from"redux-devtools-extension";const initialState={};const middleware=[thunk];const store=createStore(rootReducer,initialState,composeWithDevTools(applyMiddleware(...middleware)));export default store;
